<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/df2c2988bbaecd28b0fbec8d64327b1bbb005e19|patch 8.2.2425: cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute>
patch 8.2.2425: cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute

Problem:    Cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute.
Solution:   Do not move the cursor when skipping commands. (closes #3434)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2425: cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute · vim/vim@df2c298
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2425: cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute · vim/vim@df2c298
attachments.text: Problem: Cursor on invalid line with range and :substitute. Solution: Do not move the cursor when skipping commands. (closes #3434)

patch 8.2.2424: some tests are known to cause an error with ASAN

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1d859e24218635c57c09801840ff159cb845ae6a|patch 8.2.2422: crash when deleting with line number out of range>
patch 8.2.2422: crash when deleting with line number out of range

Problem:    Crash when deleting with line number out of range. (Houyunsong)
Solution:   Avoid using a negative line number.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2422: crash when deleting with line number out of range · vim/vim@1d859e2
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when deleting with line number out of range. (Houyunsong) Solution: Avoid using a negative line number.
